[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@firebase/component](./component.md) &gt; [InstanceFactory](./component.instancefactory.md)

## InstanceFactory type

Factory to create an instance of type T, given a ComponentContainer. ComponentContainer is the IOC container that provides [Provider](./component.provider.md) for dependencies.

NOTE: The container only provides [Provider](./component.provider.md) rather than the actual instances of dependencies. It is useful for lazily loaded dependencies and optional dependencies.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type InstanceFactory<T extends Name> = (container: ComponentContainer, instanceIdentifier?: string) => NameServiceMapping[T];
```
